action.action-desc: Mr. Perry introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

form.official-title: To amend title 23 and title 49, United States Code, to prohibit funds from certain programs to be used to fund streetcars, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the No Desire for Streetcars Act.

subsection.text: Section 133 of title 23, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

Notwithstanding any other provision of this section, amounts apportioned to a State for each fiscal year to carry out this section may not be used for the procurement, operation, or maintenance of a streetcar.

subsection.header: Congestion mitigation and air quality improvement program
subsection.text: Section 149(c) of title 23, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: No funds may be provided under this section for a project for streetcars.

subsection.text: Section 5307 of title 49, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:
Notwithstanding any other provision of this section, grant funds provided under this section may not be used for the procurement, operation, or maintenance of a streetcar.
Section 5309 of title 49, United States Code, is amended by adding at the end the following:
